lu.itrust.adtop.model.tree

Class AttackDefenceTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.itrust.adtop.model.tree.Tree
      • lu.itrust.adtop.model.tree.AttackDefenceTree

  • public class AttackDefenceTree
extends Tree
    Class represent an attack defence tree This class contains attack nodes but also defence nodes
    Author:
    ersagun

      • generateAdtForEachChild

        public void generateAdtForEachChild(Node root)
        Generate recursively for each child of node in parameter the defence node associated. Method check from matrix and do the association to find measures associated
        Parameters:
        root - node

      • generateSetForAT

        public void generateSetForAT(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> defence,
                             Node n)
        create and add each measure(defence) to a new set and then ad this set as a child to the node n of parameter
        Parameters:
        defence - defence associated to this node
        n - property of this defence nodes

      • generateDefenceNodeForAT

        public void generateDefenceNodeForAT(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> defence,
                                     Node n)
        Get de defence from hashmap defence and create a defence node and insert this node as a child of node n (in this case number of defence should be equals to 1)
        Parameters:
        defence - hashmap of defence
        n - owner of this defence

      • addToChildrenDefenceNode

        public void addToChildrenDefenceNode(Node node,
                                     DefenceNode dn)
        Add a defence node as a children to the node node in parameter
        Parameters:
        node - node who will accept the defence node as a child
        dn - defence node child
